Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small Loop AllSmallLoop is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic Loop of orders 2 to 7.
<#Include Label = "AllSmallLoop">
The output loop are represented by its operation table for +, *, ^, as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small Loop
"IsASmallLoop" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic Loop of orders 2 to 7. It returns true if the model is a Small Loop, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "IsASmallLoop">
